text: Good Will Hunting is a 1997 American drama movie directed by Gus Van Sant, written by Matt Damon and Ben Affleck, and stars Robin Williams, Damon (who played Will Hunting), Affleck, Stellan Skarsg√•rd and Minnie Driver. Filming in Boston, Massachusetts. it was released on December 5, 1997. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1997 drama movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:American drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about educators Category:Movies composed by Danny Elfman Category:Movies directed by Gus Van Sant Category:Movies set in Boston Category:Movies set in universities and colleges Category:Miramax movies Category:American independent movies
title: Good Will Hunting
